forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two around the area early, then partly cloudy during the afternoon. High 9C. SE winds shifting to W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 48F. SSE winds shifting to W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low around 5C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain late. Low 41F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High near 10C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 49F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain. Low 8C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional light rain. Low 46F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High around 10C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High near 50F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. Low 8C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of light rain. Low 46F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 51F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly cloudy. Low 6C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. Low 42F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low around 5C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 41F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 53F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. Low near 5C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low around 40F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 12C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 53F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 4C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 39F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 53F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 41F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday

forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine in the morning with more clouds for later in the day. High 53F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain. Low 43F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
